name: Champion Charge Blade II
description: A fortified charge blade designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Defender Charge Blade I
description: A charge blade crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Charge Blade
description: A fortified charge blade designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Charge Blade III
description: A fortified charge blade designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura C. Blade III
description: A charge blade made to meet the villagers' needs. Looks bold, and packs a punch too.

name: Guardian Charge Blade
description: Used by village defenders, this charge blade fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Kamura C. Blade II
description: A charge blade made to meet the villagers' needs. Looks bold, and packs a punch too.

name: Kamura C. Blade I
description: A charge blade made to meet the villagers' needs. Looks bold, and packs a punch too.

name: Kamura C. Blade V
description: A charge blade made to meet the villagers' needs. Looks bold, and packs a punch too.

name: Kamura Ninja C. Blade
description: An improvement on the Kamura charge blade. Rampage got you worried? Not anymore.

name: Kamura Warrior C. Blade
description: An improvement on the Kamura charge blade. Rampage got you worried? Not anymore.

name: Duke's Shield
description: A charge blade modeled after Malzeno's wings. Gallantry to complement one's pomposity.

name: Kamura Warrior C. Blade+
description: An improvement on the Kamura charge blade. Rampage got you worried? Not anymore.

name: Kamura Fine C. Blade
description: Kamura spirit fills this charge blade, as tough as a fortress and rampant as war.

name: Bloodeagle Adler
description: A charge blade modeled after Malzeno's wings. Atrocity to complement one's brutality.

name: Dear Lutemis I
description: A Rathian charge blade, it houses a rare evil. Thorny as the queen's personality.

name: Dear Lutemis II
description: A Rathian charge blade, it houses a rare evil. Thorny as the queen's personality.

name: Dear Lutemia
description: A Dear Lutemis upgrade. Its beauty is sublime yet severe at the same time.

name: Dear Lutemia+
description: A Dear Lutemis upgrade. Its beauty is sublime yet severe at the same time.

name: Dear Lutemineva
description: To oppose the queen is to hail death. An execution by flame-laced axe blade.

name: Rosenrupe
description: A charge blade forged with spiky Espinas thorns. Every cut causes stinging pain.

name: Dear Lutemineva+
description: To oppose the queen is to hail death. An execution by flame-laced axe blade.

name: Rosenemolgia
description: Tempered Espinas charge blade, lashing out with the beast's great fury in every swing.

name: Rosenrupe+
description: A charge blade forged with spiky Espinas thorns. Every cut causes stinging pain.

name: Weissritter I
description: Uses vicious amber Barioth fangs. Still imposing, even without the beast attached.

name: Weissritter II
description: Uses vicious amber Barioth fangs. Still imposing, even without the beast attached.

name: Weissritter III
description: Uses vicious amber Barioth fangs. Still imposing, even without the beast attached.

name: Pavadira
description: Upgraded Barioth charge blade that commands awe and emanates supreme beauty.

name: Frostrail
description: Upgraded Barioth charge blade that commands awe and emanates supreme beauty.

name: Frostrail+
description: Upgraded Barioth charge blade that commands awe and emanates supreme beauty.

name: Dreadfeller
description: Amid fear and biting cold, prey succumbs to its inevitable end.

name: Usurper's Lightning II
description: Zinogre sparks fly from this blade. Call forth its fury and cleave the very skies.

name: Despot's Thundergale
description: Upgrade of Usurper's Lightning. Each cut resounds like a Zinogre's howl.

name: Usurper's Lightning I
description: Zinogre sparks fly from this blade. Call forth its fury and cleave the very skies.

name: Despot's Thundergale+
description: Upgrade of Usurper's Lightning. Each cut resounds like a Zinogre's howl.

name: Shovedown Blade II
description: Generous use of Tetranadon shell means extra weight... and extra destruction.

name: Oppressor's Thunderclap
description: Zinogre dashes with lightning speed, rending heaven and earth with sonic booms.

name: Shovedown Blade I
description: Generous use of Tetranadon shell means extra weight... and extra destruction.

name: Spinning Takedown
description: With this blade, you'll subdue your prey with a warrior's vigor.

name: Spinning Takedown+
description: With this blade, you'll subdue your prey with a warrior's vigor.

name: Whirling Takedown
description: A refined Tetranadon charge blade. Raging blows flow from hands joined in prayer.

name: Whirling Takedown+
description: A refined Tetranadon charge blade. Raging blows flow from hands joined in prayer.

name: Giga Grips I
description: The contrast of rugged gray rock and pristine blue ore is quite beautiful.

name: Titan's Vise
description: Working with these durable but very stiff materials is a smith's worst nightmare.

name: Giga Grips II
description: The contrast of rugged gray rock and pristine blue ore is quite beautiful.

name: Giga Grips III
description: The contrast of rugged gray rock and pristine blue ore is quite beautiful.

name: Goliath Arms
description: A charge blade of distinct force and fortitude. Few craftsman can smith its tough materials.

name: Titan's Vise+
description: Working with these durable but very stiff materials is a smith's worst nightmare.

name: Surprise Axe I
description: Looks like a mere kitchen knife, leaving its true form an un-axe-pected surprise.

name: Surprise Axe II
description: Looks like a mere kitchen knife, leaving its true form an un-axe-pected surprise.

name: Stunning Axe
description: A freaky-looking Goss Harag charge blade. So stunning, it's almost demonic!

name: Striking Axe+
description: A freaky-looking Goss Harag charge blade. So stunning, it's almost demonic!

name: Striking Axe
description: A freaky-looking Goss Harag charge blade. So stunning, it's almost demonic!

name: Shocking Axe
description: The final form of the Goss Harag CB. Fear the roar of its icy transformation!

name: Hyperguard I
description: A mass-produced model that's not fancy, but gets the job done.

name: Regas Hyper
description: Upgrade of the Hyperguard. Uses alloys to preserve the feel but up the damage.

name: Hyperguard II
description: A mass-produced model that's not fancy, but gets the job done.

name: Elite Blade I
description: A well-forged steel charge blade. Once used by a hero in countless battles.

name: Kaiser Blade
description: The Elite Blade's upgrade. This high-class weapon uses only the finest materials.

name: Kaiser Blade+
description: The Kaiser Blade's upgrade. This high-class weapon uses only the finest materials.

name: Elite Blade II
description: A well-forged steel charge blade. Once used by a hero in countless battles.

name: Kaiser Kommandant
description: Upgraded Kaiser Blade, superior craftsmanship boosts its brawn along with its brilliance.

name: Kaiser Kommandant+
description: Upgraded Kaiser Blade, superior craftsmanship boosts its brawn along with its brilliance.

name: Frostmoon Icecutioner
description: Capable of freezing blood, this Lunagaron charge blade grows colder with each prey cleaved.

name: Gluttonous Glacier
description: A charge blade sealing a cruel heart. Its churning appetite eagerly awaits to be unleashed.

name: Frostmoon Icecutioner+
description: Capable of freezing blood, this Lunagaron charge blade grows colder with each prey cleaved.

name: K. Captain's Blade I
description: A noble charge blade. Bears the sigil of a knight who charged with electric force.

name: Die Walkre+
description: Enhanced K. Captain's Blade. Named for a mighty female knight who won many battles.

name: K. Captain's Blade II
description: A noble charge blade. Bears the sigil of a knight who charged with electric force.

name: Tristan and Isolde
description: A blade of hapless fate, whose legends tell of wyvern slaying and blighted love.

name: Amagarex Blade
description: Baring his fangs with thunderous deceit the usurper proclaimed, "Only one may sit upon this throne!"

name: Amagarex Blade+
description: Baring his fangs with thunderous deceit the usurper proclaimed, "Only one may sit upon this throne!"

name: Biting Edge I
description: This key will let you into a blushing bride's abode, but may not help you escape it.

name: Tristan and Isolde+
description: A blade of hapless fate, whose legends tell of wyvern slaying and blighted love.

name: Vajraklex Blade
description: A charge blade made from Astalos materials. Its attacks are charged with electrical energy.

name: Biting Edge II
description: This key will let you into a blushing bride's abode, but may not help you escape it.

name: Araknasmasher
description: Wearing an alluring dress and waiting for the arrival of the one most beloved.

name: Araknablade
description: What manner of wicked horror this formidable key opens the way to, nobody knows...

name: Crawling Crusher
description: Reflect not, walk on through the pain. The endless path of anguish suits you pair of fools.

name: Araknasmasher+
description: Wearing an alluring dress and waiting for the arrival of the one most beloved.

name: Roujatov Gate
description: A charge blade resembling a gate and key, beyond which awaits new beginnings, as does tragedy.

name: Roujatov Gate+
description: A charge blade resembling a gate and key, beyond which awaits new beginnings, as does tragedy.

name: Tigrex Divide I
description: A Tigrex charge blade, its sharp fangs and claws await a chance to strike at prey.

name: Tigrex Divide II
description: A Tigrex charge blade, its sharp fangs and claws await a chance to strike at prey.

name: Tigrex Blade
description: The Tigrex Divide's upgrade. Cruel laughter spills from its mouth, taunting foes.

name: Ent Da Lavater
description: Tragedy begot by this charge blade paints the stage in crimson hues, before the final curtain falls.

name: Huge Tigrex Blade
description: With its cruel fangs, this axe knows no rest until all foe lie slaughtered.

name: Tigrex Blade+
description: The Tigrex Divide's upgrade. Cruel laughter spills from its mouth, taunting foes.

name: Huge Tigrex Blade+
description: With its cruel fangs, this axe knows no rest until all foe lie slaughtered.

name: Mizuniya Drill I
description: An elegant charge blade known for staining foes' clothing a deep blood red.

name: Mizuniya Drill II
description: An elegant charge blade known for staining foes' clothing a deep blood red.

name: Final Fieldblade
description: An upgraded Mizuniya Drill. It creates a sea of crimson that washes away all foes.

name: Divine Fieldblade
description: Hand-in-hand, forevermore. Holy protector and ward of the axe, never change.

name: Final Fieldblade+
description: An upgraded Mizuniya Drill. It creates a sea of crimson that washes away all foes.

name: Divine Fieldblade+
description: Hand-in-hand, forevermore. Holy protector and ward of the axe, never change.

name: Kadachi Slasher I
description: Made of Tobi-Kadachi scales, the blades deliver a shock that is heart-stopping.

name: Kadachi Slasher II
description: Made of Tobi-Kadachi scales, the blades deliver a shock that is heart-stopping.

name: Kadachi Otenta
description: Charge blade that was once a prized heirloom. Its shock enhances its cutting edge.

name: Kadachi Otenta+
description: Charge blade that was once a prized heirloom. Its shock enhances its cutting edge.

name: Thunderclap Otenta
description: The rousing axe of a Tobi- Kadachi; its inscription harbors god-like power.

name: Thunderclap Otenta+
description: The rousing axe of a Tobi- Kadachi; its inscription harbors god-like power.

name: Wind Thief Sickle I
description: A charge blade that lets you attack from all angles, just like a Great Izuchi.

name: Wind Thief Sickle II
description: A charge blade that lets you attack from all angles, just like a Great Izuchi.

name: Gale Sickle
description: Charge blade that fills you with courage. To protect the weak, the strong must arise.

name: Reaper Axe Helliot
description: The highly polished axe of a righteous robber, like a tempest on the battlefield.

name: Hidden Arsenal I
description: Nargacuga-derived. Slices shadow with remarkably sharp quadruple-layered blades.

name: Gale Sickle+
description: Charge blade that fills you with courage. To protect the weak, the strong must arise.

name: Howl in the Rain
description: A charge blade as dark as night, the souls it has consumed are swept away by chaos.

name: Hidden Arsenal II
description: Nargacuga-derived. Slices shadow with remarkably sharp quadruple-layered blades.

name: Scream in the Night
description: Emerge from the shadows like an assassin as you take the life of your prey.

name: Howl in the Rain+
description: A charge blade as dark as night, the souls it has consumed are swept away by chaos.

name: Avidya Charger
description: A weapon forged by assassins in ancient times. This taboo invention brings demise to all.

name: Bone Strongarm I
description: Bone charge blade that uses the materials' strength in place of fine machinations.

name: Bone Strongarm II
description: Bone charge blade that uses the materials' strength in place of fine machinations.

name: Bone Blade I
description: A simple charge blade carved from monster bone. Inspired many similar weapon designs.

name: Bone Blade II
description: A simple charge blade carved from monster bone. Inspired many similar weapon designs.

name: Hard Bone Strongarm
description: A charge blade made of only the finest bones. Now more powerful than ever!

name: Bonesilt Veil
description: An enhanced Bone Blade. Its upgrades have given rise to a harsh and heroic weapon.

name: Bonebreaker Veil
description: A bone charge blade that ironically embodies the art of shattering skeletons.

name: Bonesilt Veil+
description: An enhanced Bone Blade. Its upgrades have given rise to a harsh and heroic weapon.

name: Bonebreaker Veil+
description: A bone charge blade that ironically embodies the art of shattering skeletons.

name: Aslat Charger
description: A lovely Seregios charge blade. Layers upon layers of sharp scales unite in brutal force.

name: Rebellious Charger
description: The Aslat Charger's upgraded form. Its golden blade is imbued with the pride of a revolutionary.

name: Guardian Blade
description: A Charge Blade worn by the guard of a ruler. It switches between offense and defense effortlessly.

name: Aslat Charger+
description: A lovely Seregios charge blade. Layers upon layers of sharp scales unite in brutal force.

name: Guardian Blade+
description: A Charge Blade worn by the guard of a ruler. It switches between offense and defense effortlessly.

name: Nadegiri
description: The final form of the Guardian Blade. Capable of turning the tables under any circumstances.

name: Jyura Silt II
description: This weapon proudly makes use of Jyuratodus parts for great defense and offense.

name: Jyura Silt I
description: This weapon proudly makes use of Jyuratodus parts for great defense and offense.

name: Clutch of the Deep
description: Send your prey sinking into the churning abyss with this Jyuratodus charge blade.

name: Clutch of the Deep+
description: Send your prey sinking into the churning abyss with this Jyuratodus charge blade.

name: Valtos Bow
description: A charge blade of menacing destruction, heavy blows stealing away freedom like a quagmire.

name: Valtos Bow+
description: A charge blade of menacing destruction, heavy blows stealing away freedom like a quagmire.

name: Axelion Blade II
description: A charge blade made from Rathalos materials. Supports igniting attacks.

name: Axelion Blade I
description: A charge blade made from Rathalos materials. Supports igniting attacks.

name: Bardichion Blade+
description: The Axelion Blade's upgrade. The face carved into the shield represents pure rage.

name: Bardichion Blade
description: The Axelion Blade's upgrade. The face carved into the shield represents pure rage.

name: Flamlion Blade
description: Baring his fangs with fiery fury the ruler proclaimed, "Only one may sit upon this throne!"

name: Bellowing Blow I
description: In axe mode, it looks like a creepy face. You swear you can hear wailing when swung.

name: Bellowing Blow II
description: In axe mode, it looks like a creepy face. You swear you can hear wailing when swung.

name: Illusory Frilled Wail+
description: You swear this creepy-faced axe cries out in the night or is it your imagination?

name: Illusory Frilled Wail
description: You swear this creepy-faced axe cries out in the night or is it your imagination?

name: Nightmare Frilled Wail
description: A charge blade carrying the nightmare-inducing dark rage of a Somnacanth. Sleep well!

name: Nightmare Frilled Wail+
description: A charge blade carrying the nightmare-inducing dark rage of a Somnacanth. Sleep well!

name: Bloom Snow Wail
description: In axe mode, it looks like a terrible face. Faint screams chill all who dare pay heed.

name: Bloom Snow Wail+
description: In axe mode, it looks like a terrible face. Faint screams chill all who dare pay heed.

name: Flicker Blizzard Wail
description: When this bizarre face lets out its light, a scream chills the wielder's heart.

name: Poisonous Veil I
description: This charge blade's dark edge and poisonous sac fill the enemy with dread.

name: Poisonous Veil II
description: This charge blade's dark edge and poisonous sac fill the enemy with dread.

name: Infected Veil
description: A Poisonous Veil upgrade. Its deadly toxin creates chaos that knows no end.

name: Malefico Veil
description: Final form of the Poisonous Veil. Venomous enough to fell wyverns, none who face its blade survive.

name: Infected Veil+
description: A Poisonous Veil upgrade. Its deadly toxin creates chaos that knows no end.

name: Dragon Veil I
description: Charge blade made of dragon bones. If you listen close, you'll hear it whispering.

name: Dragon Veil II
description: Charge blade made of dragon bones. If you listen close, you'll hear it whispering.

name: Malefico Veil+
description: Final form of the Poisonous Veil. Venomous enough to fell wyverns, none who face its blade survive.

name: Dragonsong
description: What were once whispers have swollen to deafening howls. Follow them to the hunt.

name: Dragonsong+
description: What were once whispers have swollen to deafening howls. Follow them to the hunt.

name: Draquila Reaver
description: A booming roar guides a raging heart. Hunt calamity, threats, preyand all who do you wrong.

name: Barroth Anchor I
description: An earthy charge blade made from a Barroth. Offers both defense and smashing power.

name: Draquila Reaver+
description: A booming roar guides a raging heart. Hunt calamity, threats, preyand all who do you wrong.

name: Rugged Anchor
description: A Barroth Anchor upgrade. The further-hardened shield provides unrivaled defense.

name: Barroth Anchor II
description: An earthy charge blade made from a Barroth. Offers both defense and smashing power.

name: Barroth Guardian
description: A remodeled Rugged Anchor. The further-hardened shield provides unrivaled defense.

name: Barroth Guardian+
description: A remodeled Rugged Anchor. The further-hardened shield provides unrivaled defense.

name: Barroth Reanchor
description: In one stroke, flesh, bone, and all vestiges of hope are utterly demolished.

name: Golm Heart
description: A charge blade like the robust armor of a guardian. Stand unshaken against all assault.

name: Golm Heart+
description: A charge blade like the robust armor of a guardian. Stand unshaken against all assault.

name: Diablos Strongarm II
description: A desert tyrant that kicks up clouds of sand with each cataclysmic strike.

name: Diablos Strongarm I
description: A desert tyrant that kicks up clouds of sand with each cataclysmic strike.

name: Grand Gordlock
description: A defender's charge blade. When the time comes, unleash its might to fulfill your mission.

name: Cera Strongarm
description: A Diablos Strongarm upgrade. Smashes life with explosive and uncontainable anger.

name: Cera Cediment
description: A desert tyrant that kicks up clouds of sand with each cataclysmic strike.

name: Cera Strongarm+
description: A Diablos Strongarm upgrade. Smashes life with explosive and uncontainable anger.

name: Cera Cediment+
description: A desert tyrant that kicks up clouds of sand with each cataclysmic strike.

name: Rough Roller I
description: Based on a curled Volvidon, the multi-textured shell facilitates fierce attacks.

name: Rough Roller II
description: Based on a curled Volvidon, the multi-textured shell facilitates fierce attacks.

name: Vortax+
description: A charge blade honed by an expert hand to rage against its prey in a vortex of pain.

name: Sinister Slasher II
description: This charge blade waits for its chance to strikeit has more than blades in store...

name: Rotaxion+
description: Revisions to the design let this Volvidon charge blade perform graceful spins.

name: Sinister Slasher I
description: This charge blade waits for its chance to strikeit has more than blades in store...

name: Sinister Shade Axe
description: A spirit weaned on blood survives only by its taste, and craves it more each day.

name: Rotaxion
description: Revisions to the design let this Volvidon charge blade perform graceful spins.

name: Vortax
description: A charge blade honed by an expert hand to rage against its prey in a vortex of pain.

name: Sinister Shade Axe+
description: A spirit weaned on blood survives only by its taste, and craves it more each day.

name: Mighty Soulcrusher
description: Once wielded with the power of the spirits to subdue a great wyvern.

name: Elendskraft
description: The skull signifies death; once fully charged, it blasts foes into oblivion.

name: Elendskraft+
description: The skull signifies death; once fully charged, it blasts foes into oblivion.

name: Unheilskraft
description: Final form of Elendskraft. Drags its victims down to dark and hellish depths.

name: Vengeful Broadfeller
description: The azure flame of this blade is said to burn brighter the more souls it splits.

name: Le Salut
description: Pure and golden. It cleanses the soul by bringing the light of life to darkness.

name: Undying Blade I
description: A burly Rajang charge blade. The thunder engulfing its golden trails demands prey.

name: Undying Blade II
description: A burly Rajang charge blade. The thunder engulfing its golden trails demands prey.

name: L'Oppresseur
description: The gem signifies life; once fully charged, it blasts foes into the light.

name: Ikaji Immortal
description: A Rajang's spirit cries out from this blade, transformed into a peal of thunder.

name: Demonlord Blade
description: O' furious golden lion, unleash your rage and bring divine carnage.

name: Ikaji Immortal+
description: A Rajang's spirit cries out from this blade, transformed into a peal of thunder.

name: Azure Elder Blade I
description: Charge blade of Ibushi. Its vicious strikes dispel gloom and beckon clear skies.

name: Azure Elder Blade II
description: Charge blade of Ibushi. Its vicious strikes dispel gloom and beckon clear skies.

name: Unyielding Honor
description: The Undying Blade's ultimate form, reduces all opposition to dust in a flash.

name: Abyssal Gale Ward
description: Tremble in terror before the might of Ibushi, that which frenzies beasts innumerable.

name: Asylum Bellow
description: Not even gods can penetrate this shield. What glory and eternal fate it wards!

name: Thunderbolt Sawtooth I
description: Charge blade of Narwa. All who challenge it shall burn to ash in furious lightning.

name: Abyssal Storm Ward
description: Power to plunge peace into thunderous chaos is yours. Will you use it for good?

name: Asylum Peal
description: Not even gods can penetrate this shield. What shame and eternal blight it cleanses!

name: Daora's Casca I
description: A Kushala Daora charge blade from the distant north. Its divine shape repels chaos.

name: Daora's Thwartoise+
description: A Daora's Casca upgrade. Referred to as a tool of the gods by northern mythology.

name: Daora's Thwartoise
description: A Daora's Casca upgrade. Referred to as a tool of the gods by northern mythology.

name: Teostra's Striker I
description: This charge blade uses the ire of the Flame Emperor to blast open hell's gates.

name: Daora's Worldbearer
description: The implement of a god who announces winter's arrival. Holds unrelenting cold rage.

name: Teostra's Nova
description: A Teostra's Striker upgrade. It serves as the gates to purgatory, expelling evil.

name: Teostra's Nova+
description: A Teostra's Striker upgrade. It serves as the gates to purgatory, expelling evil.

name: Teostra's Redeemer
description: The Emperor of Flame's eternal hellfire awaits beyond these fiery gates to purgatory.

name: Arcane Draw I
description: This Chameleos blade knows your fate: victory to its wielder, defeat to its foes.

name: Etherward
description: You who behold Chameleos's shield, do you not hear divine voices? Heed them.

name: Etherward+
description: You who behold Chameleos's shield, do you not hear divine voices? Heed them.

name: Redwing Edge I
description: The power of the dragon's spirit makes this Valtrax charge blade light to swing.

name: Phantom Providence
description: Trust in this miraculous axe with its curious old crest, and good fortune will call.

name: Abyssal Splitter
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The tenth was a crevice to split the earth.

name: Ricebane I
description: Once, this charge blade pounded grains of rice... Now, it pounds monsters!

name: Skaltecore
description: The crimson wyvern's boon. With it, from twinkling star to dull earth, rend all.

name: Crimson Mechwing
description: The crimson wyvern's boon. With it, from twinkling star to dull earth, rend all.

name: Pounder of Rice
description: You get a rice cake! And you get a rice cake! Everyone gets a rice cake!

name: Pounder of Rice+
description: You get a rice cake! And you get a rice cake! Everyone gets a rice cake!

name: Ricebane II
description: Once, this charge blade pounded grains of rice... Now, it pounds monsters!

name: Ricebane Emperor
description: Though it makes a terrifying pounding sound, the results are very pleasing.

name: Felyne Fancy
description: The Cuddly Cat's upgrade. Polished to a sheen, as though it had been petted.

name: Felyne Fancy+
description: The Cuddly Cat's upgrade. Polished to a sheen, as though it had been petted.

name: Cuddly Cat I
description: Don't dismiss this cat-based blade. The hairs on its back can cut through wyvern hide.

name: Cuddly Cat II
description: Don't dismiss this cat-based blade. The hairs on its back can cut through wyvern hide.

name: Mandible Blade I
description: A charge blade made from the jaws of a Butterfly Beetle. The spines can cut bone.

name: Maxilla Edge
description: A Mandible Blade upgrade. It's been sharpened to the material's physical limit.

name: Mandible Blade II
description: A charge blade made from the jaws of a Butterfly Beetle. The spines can cut bone.

name: Ominous Puss
description: The Cuddly Cat's final form. Polished to a sheen, as though it had been petted.

name: Maxilla Edge+
description: A Mandible Blade upgrade. It's been sharpened to the material's physical limit.

name: Skull Edge
description: An adamantine weapon of ultimate sharpness, capable of splitting the earth with one swing.

name: Vaik Veil I
description: A blade that uses incredibly tough shell to cut through the thickest wyvern hide.

name: Vaik Veil II
description: A blade that uses incredibly tough shell to cut through the thickest wyvern hide.

name: Shieldraad
description: A Vaik Veil upgrade. This blade more than earns its keep out in the field.

name: Shieldraad+
description: A Vaik Veil upgrade. This blade more than earns its keep out in the field.

name: Armordraad
description: The Shieldraad's upgraded form, its true talent on display when cutting choice armored bream.

name: Royal Order's Battleaxe
description: A charge blade used by knights of the Order. Only those of unwavering spirit may wield it.

name: Royal Order's Battleaxe+
description: A charge blade used by knights of the Order. Only those of unwavering spirit may wield it.

name: Antique Machina CB
description: A charge blade of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Rampage C. Blade I
description: A special charge blade that gives the user access to its phantasmal powers.

name: Rampage C. Blade II
description: A special charge blade that gives the user access to its phantasmal powers.

name: Rampage C. Blade III
description: A special charge blade that gives the user access to its phantasmal powers.

name: Rampage C. Blade V
description: A special charge blade that gives the user access to its phantasmal powers.

name: Rampage C. Blade S
description: Fear not transformation fix your sights on your foe, and strike with clarity.

description: A special charge blade that gives the user access to its phantasmal powers.
